com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.common.handlers

Class SourceQueryDecoder<T extends SourceQueryRequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.handlers.MessageInboundHandler
          • com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.common.handlers.SourceQueryDecoder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of SourceQueryRequest this decoder will handle/process
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SourceQueryAuthDecoder, SourceQueryChallengeDecoder

    public abstract class SourceQueryDecoder<T extends SourceQueryRequest>
extends MessageInboundHandler
    A special decoder used for messages based on the Source Query Protocol. This handler Accepts either an instance of SourceQueryPacket or a SourceQueryResponse
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco
